description: This file defines a LearningProvider class for a Flutter app, managing lesson data and user progress, and notifying listeners of changes.

classes.name: LearningProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier class managing lessons and user progress, providing data binding capabilities to Flutter widgets.

methods.name: LearningProvider
methods.description: Constructor initializing lessons from mock services and setting up progress map.

methods.name: setProgress
methods.description: Updates progress for a specific lesson and notifies listeners.
